title: Spack blame output incorrect for blank keys

labels.name: triage
labels.description: The issue needs to be prioritized

body:
As I mentioned in https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/22598#issuecomment-808896029 , the "empty" keys in the default modules.yaml file aren't rendered correctly.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack config blame modules
# ...snip...
etc/spack/defaults/modules.yaml:32             share/pkgconfig:
etc/spack/defaults/modules.yaml:33             - PKG_CONFIG_PATH
                                               ? ''
                                               : - CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH
```

Prior to #22598 the blank lines had the correct line numbers corresponding to the values in `defaults/modules.yaml`:
```
34:    '':
35:      - CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH
```

Expected output:

```console
$ spack config blame modules
# ...snip...
etc/spack/defaults/modules.yaml:32             share/pkgconfig:
etc/spack/defaults/modules.yaml:33             - PKG_CONFIG_PATH
etc/spack/defaults/modules.yaml:34             '':
etc/spack/defaults/modules.yaml:35             - CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH
```
### Information on your system

* **Spack:** 0.16.1-2140-19b6d3589a
* **Python:** 3.8.5
* **Platform:** darwin-bigsur-skylake
* **Concretizer:** original
